div.p:
Please note group sessions will be every:
- Day of week
- Time
Schedule as follows:
1) day/month/year
2) day/month/year
3) day/month/year
4) day/month/year
5) day/month/year
6) day/month/year
7) day/month/year
8) day/month/year
9) day/month/year
The cost of the group course for this term is AEDXXX payable in advance.
Please remember there are no refunds for missed dates. In the event that TDCC unexpectedly needs to cancel any of the sessions an alternative/make-up session will be offered at the end of the term. Please arrange payment at your earliest convenience prior to sessions commencing, either:
a) In person, at The Developing Child Centre OR
b) By Credit card
If you choose to pay via your credit card, please complete the attached credit card authorization form and email it back to me. Should you need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
We look forward to welcoming you to TDCC.

If you have received this message in error, please (a) notify the sender immediately, (b) destroy this email and any attachments, and (c) do not use, copy, store and/or disclose to any person this email and any attachments. Any views or opinions presented in this email are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent The Developing Child Centre.

field.name: body_html
field.div:
Dear Parents,
We are delighted to confirm client name's place for the for the coming term Services
Sessions are booked as follows
The cost of the course is 3000AED payable by 11th April 2015. Each course consists of ten weekly sessions (same time and day).
We respectfully advise no refunds or alternative sessions will be given for missed dates. In the event of the centre cancelling a session an alternative session will be offered.
At the time of advance payment and prior to the course starting, please notify us of any dates that will be missed during the course so they will not be charged. Failure to notify in advance will mean all dates are charged and no refund or alternative dates will be given. TDCC reserves the right to refuse entry to group sessions if pre-payment is not received.
Best Regards,
“If you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.” Albert Einstein
We think different. We teach different.
At The Developing Child Centre our approach is simple. We believe every child is brilliant and we nurture and build children’s confidence and abilities. We are dedicated to identifying, building and developing skills required by all children to feel confident and succeed.
The Developing Child Centre LLC PO Box 478527 Dubai, UAE | Phone +971 4 3011900 | www.tdcc.ae
This email and any attachments are confidential and may also be privileged. If you have received this message in error, please (a) notify the sender immediately, (b) destroy this email and any attachments, and (c) do not use, copy, store and/or disclose to any person this email and any attachments. Disclosing, copying, disseminating or otherwise taking any action in connection with this communication or the information in it is prohibited and may be unlawful. Any views or opinions presented in this email are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent The Developing Child Centre.

field.name: body_html
field.div:
Dear Parents,
We are pleased to confirm group therapy sessions for Client Names
Date and Time : Appointment Date and time With: ${object.physician_id.name}, ${object.physician_id.position}
The duration of the session is 1 hour, and the cost is 300 AED per session, payable on the day.
Please remember our 12-hours cancellation policy.
Should you need to cancel or make any changes to the schedule please contact me or any of our client relationship executives.
Best Regards,
“If you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.” Albert Einstein
We think different. We teach different.
At The Developing Child Centre our approach is simple. We believe every child is brilliant and we nurture and build children’s confidence and abilities. We are dedicated to identifying, building and developing skills required by all children to feel confident and succeed.
The Developing Child Centre LLC PO Box 478527 Dubai, UAE | Phone +971 4 3011900 | www.tdcc.ae
